pages.text: And during part of the night show your humbleness for Him, and glorify Him long during a night
Indeed these love the transient (this worldâ€™s life), and they leave a cumbersome day behind
We created them and We strengthened their form, and when We want We replace them with like them as a substitute
Indeed this (Quran) is a reminder, so anyone who wants takes a way to his Master (with it)
And you do not want except if God wants. Indeed God is knowledgeable and wise
He admits anyone He wants to His mercy, and He prepared a painful punishment for the wrongdoers
By those sent in succession
then by the hurricane, gusting
and by the spreaders, spreading
then by the separators, separating
then by those communicating a reminder
as an excuse or as a warning
that indeed what you are promised shall occur
So when the stars are wiped out
and when the sky is split open
and when the mountains are powdered
and when the messengers' time is set
For what day is the appointment set
For the day of separation/decision
And do you know what the day of separation/decision is
Woe to the deniers on that day
Did We not destroy the earlier ones
Then We make the later ones follow them (in destruction)
That is how We deal with the guilty ones
Woe to the deniers on that day
